double HistogramFitFCN::operator() ( const std::vector< double > &  par  )  const

Definition at line 24 of file HistogramFitFCN.cpp.

References fNDoF, fPulseHist, fRefineFactor, fTemplateHist, and fTimeOffset.

00024                                                                       {
00025   // Chi2 fit with pedestal P, amplitude A, and timing T
00026   // Warning: The time is truncated to an int, so if there's
00027   // so if the step size in MINUIT is smalled than 1,
00028   // Any value of T will probably be seen as minimized, which it
00029   // almost certainly will not be.
00030   double chi2 = 0.;
00031   double P = par[0];
00032   double A = par[1];
00033   int T_int = (int)fTimeOffset;            // Integral part of time shift
00034   double T_flt = fTimeOffset - (double)T_int; // Floating point offset for linear interpolation
00035 
00036   bool print_dbg = false;
00037   if (strcmp(fTemplateHist->GetName(), "hTemplate_ScL") == 0) {
00038     print_dbg = false;
00039   }
00040 
00041   if (print_dbg) { 
00042     std::cout << "HistogramFitFCN::operator() (start):" << std::endl;
00043     std::cout << "\tpedestal = " << P << ", amplitude = " << A << ", time (integer part) = " << T_int << " and time (float part) = " << T_flt << std::endl;
00044   }
00045  
00046   int half_range = 10*fRefineFactor; // remove a few bins from the fit
00047   int bounds[2];
00048   bounds[0] = half_range+1;//std::max(T_int - fTemplateHist->GetNbinsX() / 2, 1);
00049   bounds[1] = std::min(fTemplateHist->GetNbinsX(), fPulseHist->GetNbinsX()) - half_range-1; //std::min(T_int + fTemplateHist->GetNbinsX() / 2 - 1, fPulseHist->GetNbinsX());
00050 
00051   fNDoF = ((bounds[1] - bounds[0] + 1)/fRefineFactor) - par.size(); // +1 because we include both ends of the bounds when we loop through
00052 
00053   if (print_dbg) {
00054     std::cout << "NBinsX: hTemplate = " << fTemplateHist->GetNbinsX() << ", hPulse = " << fPulseHist->GetNbinsX() << std::endl;
00055     std::cout << "Bound Defns: " << std::endl;
00056     std::cout << "\tbounds[0] = " << bounds[0] << std::endl;
00057     std::cout << "\tbounds[1] = " << bounds[1] << std::endl;
00058   }
00059 
00060   // Chi2 will be zero if shift is too high
00061   if (print_dbg) {
00062     if (bounds[1] <= bounds[0])
00063       std::cout << "ERROR: Fit of two histograms involves shifting one out-of-bounds (no overlap)!" << std::endl;
00064   }
00065 
00066   double f;
00067   double template_pedestal = fTemplateHist->GetBinContent(1);
00068   for (int i = bounds[0]+(fRefineFactor/2.0); i <= bounds[1]-(fRefineFactor/2.0); i += fRefineFactor) { // calculate the chi^2 based on the centre of the 5 bins to avoid getting abonus from mathcing all 5
00069     // We shift and scale the template so that it matches the pulse.
00070     // This is because, when we have a normalised template, we will get the actual amplitude, pedestal and time from the fit and not just offsets
00071     f = fTemplateHist->GetBinContent(i - T_int) + T_flt*(fTemplateHist->GetBinContent(i - T_int + 1) - fTemplateHist->GetBinContent(i - T_int)); // linear interpolation between the i'th and the (i+1)'th bin
00072     if (print_dbg) {
00073       std::cout << "i = " << i << ", i - T_int = " << i-T_int << std::endl;
00074       std::cout << "f (before) = " << f << std::endl;
00075     }
00076     f = A * (f - template_pedestal) + P; // apply the transformation to this bin
00077     if (print_dbg) {
00078       std::cout << "f (after) = " << f << std::endl;
00079     }
00080 
00081 
00082     double delta = fPulseHist->GetBinContent(i) - f;
00083     if (print_dbg) {
00084       std::cout << "Pulse Value = " << fPulseHist->GetBinContent(i) << ", delta = " << delta << std::endl;
00085     }
00086     double hTemplate_bin_error = fTemplateHist->GetBinError(i - T_int);
00087     //double hPulse_bin_error = fPulseHist->GetBinError(i);
00088     chi2 += delta*delta / (hTemplate_bin_error*hTemplate_bin_error);
00089     if (print_dbg) {
00090       std::cout << "Template Error = " << hTemplate_bin_error << ", chi2 (added) = " << delta*delta/(hTemplate_bin_error*hTemplate_bin_error) << ", chi2 (total) = " << chi2 << std::endl;
00091     }
00092   }
00093 
00094   if (print_dbg) {
00095     std::cout << "HistogramFitFCN::operator() (end): " << std::endl;
00096     std::cout << "\tFit:\tChi2 " << chi2 << "\tP "
00097               << P << "(" << par[0] << ")\tA " << A << "(" << par[1] << ")\tT " << T_int
00098               << std::endl << std::endl;
00099   }
00100   return chi2;
00101 }
